title: Contact
text:
My Contact Information
You can reach me via email at luchengj@bu.edu. You can also call me at 6173598745. Feel free to get in touch!

title: Projects
text:
My Projects

Project A – Worked as a volunteer in a hospital, collecting nucleic acids and counting patient information.
Project B – Worked as an investment intern at CITIC Securities, forecasting profits for CITIC Securities’ financial products.
Project C — Worked as a data analysis intern, summarizing and tabulating daily stock market information

This is a photo taken during my internship at CITIC Securities when I was traveling with the team.

title: CV
text:

title: About Me
text:
My Introduction
Hello! My name is Chengjie Lu. I am currently a graduate student pursuing a master’s degree in Business Analytics.
I have a passion for data analysis and machine learning. This page contains a brief introduction about me.
